column4: If i deleted a file.. that was not a like uninstallable program.. its not installed just downloaded and used it no setup what so ever.. if i just delete this will it permanently go away? sorry i cant think of any better way to put it
if you delete a file, it goes away, yes...
well the program could have done whatever it wanted to when you ran it...
if it's a windows virus than it probably would not do much more than affect your ~/.wine/drive_c/
